alert.note: Alert for Fillmore; Houston (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 1:14AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Allamakee, northeastern Winneshiek, southwestern Houston and southeastern Fillmore Counties through 200 AM CDT... At 114 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Spring Grove, or 12 miles west of Caledonia, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Mabel around 120 AM CDT. Spring Grove around 135 AM CDT. Caledonia around 145 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include County 16 And 4 Corners Drive, Choice, Highlandville, Quandahl, Riceford, Sattre, Newhouse, Dun Romin Park Campground, Beaver Creek Valley State Park and Newburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
